alternate_methods:
##Change by phone

You can change your test by calling the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).

$C

**DSA theory test bookings and enquiries**  

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

$C

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
introduction: Change your driving theory test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at.
more_information:
You'll need your provisional driving licence number.

% You must give at least 3 clear working days’ notice to change your test date or you’ll have to pay again. Sundays and public holidays don’t count as working days. %
overview: Change your driving theory test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at
title: Change the date of your driving theory test
